mapper.select: SELECT s.id , s.category , s.title , IFNULL(u.nickname, "탈퇴 회원") as writer , s.created_at , s.view_cnt FROM user u RIGHT OUTER JOIN study s ON u.id = s.user_id Where s.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY s.id DESC

SELECT s.id , s.category , s.title , u.nickname as writer , s.content , s.file , s.created_at , s.updated_at , s.view_cnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studylikes WHERE post_id = s.id) as likes FROM user u JOIN study s ON u.id = s.user_id where delete_yn = 'N' and id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study(category, title, content, file, view_cnt, user_id) VALUES (#{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{file}, #{viewCnt}, (select id from user where nickname = #{writer}));
mapper.update: UPDATE study SET category = #{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, file = #{file}, updated_at = now() where id = #{id}
UPDATE study SET delete_yn = #{deleteYn}, deleted_at = now() where id = #{id}
UPDATE study SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
